duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide hardware and software IT support and technical education to end users remotely and onsite.
Troubleshoot client-side network connectivity issues, including digital authentication, remote access, secure Wi-Fi, wired connectivity, and password resets.
Support user requests and perform break/fix or remote installations as needed.
Lead in ticket processes and provide coaching for other Technicians.
Document systems and ensure process improvement.
Display learning agility and seek feedback to optimize support.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 1-2 years of experience in a Help Desk role with walk-up service required, VIP support preferred.
